entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 04:46 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
